markdownRemark.html: Two native Spanish teachers, Jorge Ipiña Rasero and María Aránzazu Rivas Leonardo (Gorka and Arantza), who have been enjoying teaching Spanish to foreign residents on the Costa del Sol for 20 years. They both have a Degree in Hispanic Philology and a Master's Degree in the Teaching of Spanish as a Second Language. Private lessons or in small groups (5). Located in Fuengirola.

frontmatter.title: Spanish lessons Fuengirola
